recommended_degree: Teknik Listrik, Teknik Instalasi Listrik, Teknik Listrik Industri, Teknik Mesin, Teknik Mesin Industri (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Key Responsibilities:
1. Electrical Maintenance & Troubleshooting
Install, inspect, and maintain electrical wiring, equipment, and fixtures in compliance with safety standards.
Diagnose and repair electrical issues on production machines, pumps, lighting systems, and control panels.
Perform regular preventive maintenance on electrical systems to reduce downtime and prevent equipment failure.
Calibrate and test electrical components to ensure operational reliability.

2. Mechanical & Facility Maintenance
Support general maintenance of mechanical systems such as motors, pumps, conveyors, and HVAC units.
Assist in performing routine inspections and repairs of facility infrastructure (lighting, plumbing, etc.).
Ensure tools and equipment are properly maintained and safely stored.

3. Preventive & Predictive Maintenance
Execute preventive maintenance schedules according to the companyâ€™s maintenance plan.
Record all maintenance activities and update maintenance logs for equipment history tracking.
Report potential failures, abnormalities, or hazards before they cause operational disruption.
Suggest and implement improvements to enhance machine performance and reliability.

4. Installation & Project Support
Assist in new equipment installation, commissioning, and electrical setup.
Read and interpret electrical drawings, wiring diagrams, and technical manuals.
Support engineering projects related to energy efficiency, automation, and equipment upgrades.

5. Safety & Compliance
Ensure all maintenance activities comply with safety standards and company regulations.
Identify and report unsafe conditions or practices immediately.
Participate in safety training and promote awareness of electrical safety protocols.
Maintain a clean, organized, and hazard-free working environment.

6. Documentation & Reporting
Maintain accurate records of maintenance tasks, parts used, and equipment conditions.
Prepare maintenance reports and submit them to the supervisor for review.
Assist in documenting technical procedures and maintenance checklists.
